about_the_game:
This concise experience has striking visuals & screenshot candy.
As an immersive sim and streamlined walking simulator, quest on your Holy Journey to Ascend in the Holy Chamber!
Holy Journey of Salvation is a short FPS Walking Simulator with Cinematic moments & Immersive Sim vibes. As the player, you will solve puzzles using Mythical interpretations of Chemistry & Combat to fight Enemies.

Spiritualization of Chemistry

Worship the Holy Spirits like Xyjuh and Coh Toh as they help you overcome your obstacles.

Realistic Inspired Chemical Reactions

Do you have a good understanding of Chemistry?
Great! You'll LOVE how your real chemistry understanding is applied in this casual Immersive experience with suspension of reality.

Concise Experience

Not everyone has hours to pour into a game. This concise experience is masterfully crafted to allow people with busy schedules to have a completable experience in less time than it would take to watch a movie.

Great Graphics, Not hard to run!

The target system is a low powered APU system, so if you have an older PC, or a Steam Deck, you'll be able to play this game no problem!
Plus, with the high quality AAA quality graphics, it'll look fantastic!
You don't have to compromise.

Deep Themes

Are you an analytic movie viewer?
See if you can find all the hidden story themes this game has to offer. See what the game means to you.

content_descriptors.notes:
Killing with guns, Zombies, killing animals, implied suffocation, sounds of choking/suffocating, implied melting, implied radiation, implied incineration, implied death by monster. 
Depictions of death & dying including animations of dying.
Dead bodies. 
Psychological horror sequences. 
Moody melancholy atmosphere.

name: Holy Journey of Salvation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Any normal processor from 2012 or newer. intel i3, AMD Ryzen or FX 6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950, GTX 1030, Ryzen APU graphics,
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: Mouse & Keyboard or Xbox equivalent Controller. Optimized for 16:9
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: intel i5, Ryzen CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics card GTX 970 GTX 1050, AMD R9 280, AMD RX 470 AMD RX 570, AMD RX 5600
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: External DAC capable of driving high fidelity audio gear
  • Additional Notes: Mouse & Keyboard or Xbox equivalent Controller. Optimized for 16:9

short_description: Holy Journey of Salvation is a cinematic Immersive Sim FPS. As the Spirit Ascender, you must embark on a Holy Journey to ascend in the Holy Chamber! In this Post Apocalypse setting, your tribe has deep understanding of Chemistry... but did they get it right in all the wrong ways?
